ygData.subject: RE: help with cleric armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: This and the ingot on the bottom of the Everfrost river (/loc 2996, -5771 or so). Be sure to get an endure breath kind of buff before diving... ... De: Chris
ygData.messageBody:
This and the ingot on the bottom of the Everfrost river (/loc 2996, -5771 or
so). Be sure to get an endure breath kind of buff before diving...

-----Message d'origine-----
De: Chris Drew [mailto:xcdrewx@...]
Date: lundi 24 janvier 2000 14:02
∩┐╜: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Objet: RE: [EQ-Clerics] help with cleric armor quests


From: Chris Drew <xcdrewx@...>

What are the total requirments for that quest?

Thanks
Chris

Dharkness
Vallon Zek


--- Jean-Gael Brard <jgbrard@...> wrote:
> He gives the icon needed for the gauntlets (AC10,
> Agi+5, Sv Cold+5, Weight
> 3.8). Got 6 PH before him (so he was 7th).
>
> Thormaelle, Tunare
>
> -----Message d'origine-----
> De: Chris Drew [mailto:xcdrewx@...]
> Date: lundi 24 janvier 2000 13:43
> ∩┐╜: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Objet: Re: [EQ-Clerics] help with cleric armor
> quests
>
>
> From: Chris Drew <xcdrewx@...>
>
>
> What cleric piece does he give?
>
> Later
> Chris
>
> Dharkness
> Vallon Zek
>
> --- Mark <azure@...> wrote:
> > From: "Mark" <azure@...>
> >
> > Babbin is in the 3rd floor. If you go thru the
> door
> > across from the secret door, go thru that room,
> you
> > go over a pile of dirt in the doorway. This
> leaves
> > you in a room where if you looks left, there is a
> > corner missing.. anyways, go thru the door to the
> > left. Inside that room, is a pillar fallen on its
> > side. Babbin spawns behind that fallen pillar, it
> > is a 7 hour 5 minute spawn. I killed about 12
> > placehgolders before he popped, but then he
> spawned
> > twice in a row...go figure.
> >
> > Azuur
> >
> >
> > -----Original Messa
> > Gloves: Where in befallen does Babbinsbort
> > spawn? I know somewhere on the 3rd level... but
> i'm
> > really not very familiar with befallen... not
> nearly
> > as familiar as I should be as a cleric =)
> >
> >
